item.description:
Hey All,

I know that it is short notice, but Cloud Cult is going to be at the Middle East Downstairs this Wednesday. I've seen this Minnesota band in concert 3 times previously and the show has always been great. They put on one of the more interesting shows you will see which includes live artists who will finish a painting that will be auctioned at the end of the set. You won't be disappointed to pay the $10 to get in. If you can't make it to the show you should still check out this band - they are also trying to lead the revolution of "green bands".

www.cloudcult.com
http://www.myspace.co...

Give me a call if you decide to go to the show - 701-331-0920. We can all hang out at the show and maybe grab at drink after.

What else do you have to do on a Wednesday?
item.how_to_find_us: Close to the Central T stop on the Redline
item.why: This is one of my favorite bands to see live - they put on one of the more interesting shows you will see which includes live artists who will finish a painting that will be auctioned at the end of the set.
item.name: Cloud Cult - Wednesday - Middle East Downstairs
